sentence.Network_en: A bishop of the highest rank, heading an archdiocese or a province.
sentence.Network_cn: 大主教,主教长最高级别的主教, 领导一大主教(管辖)区或一个省.

sentence.Network_en: Augustine's Seminary, and was ordained as a priest in 1991 for the archdiocese of Toronto.
sentence.Network_cn: 吴神父在一九九一年晋升神父圣品职位,为多伦多总教区服务,牧养天主子民.

sentence.Network_en: The cardinal, who had previously defended the archdiocese's handling of the case, recanted and apologized.
sentence.Network_cn: 曾为该教区对此案的态度辩护的红衣主教劳撤回辩护并公开道歉.

1949年9月，大主教管区（archdiocese）发出敕令谴责菲尼的言论并且停止了他的神职。1952年2月，菲尼神父最终被驱逐出了教区。

the Globe also reported that the archdiocese had quietly paid $ 10 million to settle some 50 cases against Geoghan .《波士顿环球报》还报道说，该教区曾悄悄用1000万美元来平息针对乔根的50起指控。
of or relating to an archdiocese ., 属于或与大主教管辖区有关.

entry.def: An archdiocese is the area over which an archbishop has control.
